mapper.select: select product_code, userID, product_amount, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_type, product_name from t_cart where userID = #{userID}
mapper.insert: insert into t_cart(product_code, userID, product_amount, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_type, product_name ) value (#{product_code}, #{userID}, #{product_amount}, #{product_price}, #{product_size}, #{product_color}, #{product_type}, #{product_name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_cart where product_code = #{product_code} and userID = #{userID}
